findings.title: Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The finding highlights the potential issue with accommodating non-ERC20-compliant tokens, specifically mentioning the `transfer` function and its idiosyncrasies from widely-used token contracts like USDT.

findings.title: Proper Allowance Reset For Old Staking Contracts
findings.description: The `setStakingContract()` function forgets to cancel the previous spending allowance from the old `stakingContract`.

findings.title: Removal of Unused State/Code
findings.description: Unused code or unnecessary redundancies can be safely removed from multiple contracts, including `Staking` contract with unused states such as `usedIds` and `unlockTimestamps`.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the AirSwap protocol, there is a privileged 'owner' account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the system-wide operations. It also has the privilege to regulate or govern the flow of assets within the protocol.
